subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Triathlon
lead_paragraph: Manuel Huerta, who will represent the United States in the triathlon at the Olympics, began training as a child in Havana and says his journey serves as a “message to the Castro government.”
snippet: Manuel Huerta, who will represent the United States in the triathlon at the Olympics, began training as a child in Havana and says his journey serves as a “message to the Castro government.”
